channel.title: VB.NET Probably an easy question
channel.description:
I don't really know how I could name what I'm looking for so I obviously can't look it up this way either.
This is a very basic first design for a game I'm working on. [img]http://i.imgur.com/DLthnnp.png[/img]
My problem lays in where you see the screen/colorblind preferences.
They get toggled by clicking the preferences icon in the right down corner. But I also want to make other things, like e.g. friend list appear at the same position.
How would I go about doing this in a correct way? making the controls invisible and back visible is my only thought at the moment, but I doubt it is a good way.
Thanks in advance.
[b]Update:[/b] I used a panel and add labels(controls) to it now at runtime. I believe this is a a much better way than making my controls visible/invisible. If somebody has a better way, still let me know!
[b]Update:[/b] My final way of doing it: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657073.0.html
